code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{CONTRACTS_BY_CHAIN}from"./constants/contracts";import{ethers}from"ethers";import TokenCard from"./components/TokenCard";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function App(){const[signer,setSigner]=useState(null);const[config,setConfig]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const setup=async()=>{const provider=new ethers.providers.Web3Provider(window.ethereum);await provider.send("eth_requestAccounts",[]);const signer=provider.getSigner();setSigner(signer);const{chainId}=await provider.getNetwork();const cfg=CONTRACTS_BY_CHAIN[chainId];if(!cfg)return alert("Unsupported chain");setConfig(cfg);};setup();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:"2rem",fontFamily:"Arial"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\uD83E\uDE99 JUSD Wallet Sam Technology"}),!config?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\u23F3 Detecting chain..."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\uD83C\uDF10 Connected to: ",config.name]}),Object.entries(config.tokens).map(_ref=>{let[name,addr]=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TokenCard,{name:name,address:addr,signer:signer},name);})]})]});}
